Text: This is an amazing series, and I would like to thank BBC and the uploader, some very harsh questions are asked in this series and would highly recommend everyone to watch it even if you are skeptic like myself.

@ azzlips, congrats for not being an ignorant a-hole like most that comment here and refuse to learn anything new and still believe in Fox "news".

And {wasalnaser}, keep up the good work.  As my father told me: An ignorant person that wants to learn is called a student; an ignorant person that doesn't want to learn is called stupid.
